text: Whopper Whopper is a song that was made by Burger King in 2022, debuting as a commercial that year advertising the Whopper, it became a single in 2023, it then became a popular sensation that same year due to it being a very catchy song. Often driving fans of specifically NFL mad due to the big amount of time it was played. == Reception == The song became a popular sensation in 2023, its catchy tune has been both loved and hated. It was played many times during the NFL Playoffs of 2023. The song has become an internet meme. ==References== Category:Internet memes Category:Burger King
title: Whopper Whopper
